name: Tower-Offense
description:
Tower-Offense

If you like Tower-Defense and FPS games then this genre fusion is for you.

You can play in the browser but I recommend the downloaded version for the best Experience.

How To Play:

Objective: Protect the shielded dome from evil robots.

Controls: 

  • Walk => W, A, S, D
  • Shoot => Left Mouse Button
  • Jump => Space
  • Dash => Left Shift (while moving)
  • Interact => Hold E
  • Pause => R
